main.name: Omer Sadeh
main.description: I like to code Many things!
main.bio: I'm a 26 years old developer, currently finishing my second year as a CS student at Reichman University (IDC). currently working alongside Psychology students at MiLab Research lab to discover how people and robots intercat together!
main.contactmessage: Feel free to write me an email, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible!

resume.skillmessage: Here is a short list of my programming skills:

education.description: Majored in Computers & Electronics, participated & won in an international robotics competition.

work.title: Fullstack Developer
work.description: Programming robots in python and java. Building web interface using HTML, JS, CSS and React. Working in collaboration with CS, Psychology and Communications Students in Human-Robot-Interaction researches. Role requiring fast self learning and strong technical capabilities.

work.title: Advanced Communications Systems technitian
work.description: Working with advanced classified computer and communication systems. Programing routers, switches and communication systems in Linux and UNIX. The role required creativity and fast problem solving in real time.

projects.title: Android Ripple Game
projects.category: A fun little android game made with React.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Site
projects.category: A portfolio site I made with React and JS.

projects.title: Wordle Clone - React - WIP
projects.category: A Wordle clone made with React. Still work in progress
